Theme

theme为应用默认主题，已经内置了fonts、colors、text等主题内容，可支持扩展

使用方法#

const myTheme: Theme = {
...DefaultTheme,
colors: {
myOwnColor: "#BADA55",
black: "#000000",
white: "#FFFFFF"
}
};
const ThemeDemoScreen = ({ theme, changeTheme }) => {
console.log("color " + theme.colors.white);
return (
<SafeAreaView>
<ScrollView>
<View style={{ flexDirection: "column", width: "100%", height: 300, backgroundColor: theme.colors.white }}>
<Text style={[theme.fonts.medium, { fontSize: 12, color: theme.colors.black }]}>测试jk1</Text>
<Text style={[{ fontSize: 12, color: theme.colors.black, fontWeight: "normal" }]}>测试jk</Text>
<Button
title={"click"}
onPress={() => {
console.log("changeTheme ----> " + theme.type);
let th = theme.type == "dark" ? myTheme : DarkTheme;
console.log("changeTheme1 ----> " + th.type);
changeTheme(th);
}}
/>
</View>
</ScrollView>
</SafeAreaView>
);
};
export default () => WithTheme(ThemeDemoScreen, myTheme);
在APP最外层嵌套代码如下：
<ThemeContextProvider>
......
</ThemeContextProvider>

Props#

theme: Theme;#

主题配置信息

changeTheme: function;#
